post.body: dunno about politicians but common people like u n i.. there was a lot of dialog going around about what we should do next.
@shaktijs #mumbai got one persistent question. which i will put on to u guys. what shd we do next to keep the movement on?
#mumbai even we were surprised. didnt expect people to come till 930. glad u felt things went well. it was all due to great help
Cheeky_J: @ajeshh #mumbai well we had 3 different crowds at different intervals! did the walk to the station twice
#mumbai yea it got very crowded...i was trying to order it out.was giving orders...led the walk to the station. wru?
#mumbai carter road at 9. http://tr.im/1mg8
#mumbai meetup.. i cant make it to leopolds... too short of a notice.. but hope to see some twitters at carter road tonite!
got link? Ht reports - RR PATIL - terrorist had plans to kill over 5000 peopls #mumbai
shaktijis your coming tonite? cya there!
@mehulved #mumbai candle my foot ... ask govt to take revenge on pakis .. force with force? havent u learnt anything silly rabbit?
Qwappy: #mumbai yeah citizen clock and candle walks... something is better than doing nothing. this might create more dialog n ideas to flow
#mumbai all different kinds of people pitched in and were willing to pitch in. even crossing the road which was hectic was managed well!
#mumbai there are people still there. no one wanted to leave.
Qwappy: mumbai #mumbai 1000 instead of 70 wow now what? a mix of everything, and it was a lot of young people and from all walks of life
#mumbai we just had a massive massive turnout for our candle vigil @ bandra. over a 1000 people turned up. and we were expecting just 70!
#mumbaiguys! we just had a massive massive turnout for our candle vigil @ bandra. over a 1000 people turned up. n we were expecting just 70!
#mumbai finally got our permissions for the candle vigil tonite @ carters! cya there!! please bring candles n if u want to read out sumthin
RT @zephoria: 4 those thinking retaliation is the only way 4ward Mahatma Gandhi said- Eye for an eye makes the whole world blind. #mumbai
#mumbai if you cant make it to a vigil...then leave a candle in your window, or near the closest police station. they truly appreciate it!
naveenks: #mumbai people with your thinking is one of the many reasons why we have terrorist attacks around the world .be constructive!
